name: Plenty Karts
description:
Welcome to Plenty Karts, a single-player 2D kart racer blended with a side scroller. Use machine guns, heat-seeking rockets, mortars, tar traps, and more to slow your opponents and finish in first place. Race against three computer opponents and battle against multiple bosses as you try to become the champion of the Plenty Karts league.

Key Features

  • 4 Different Speed Settings and 4 different AI difficulties, allowing up to 16 different difficulty combinations.
  • Race your way to the top in a full story mode.
  • Create your own kart using the character creator.
  • Battle against 5 bosses.
  • More than 20 tracks across 8 different themed areas.
  • 15 themed songs.
  • Race against your own ghost in time trial mode.

Plinio Plenty is looking for new racers brave enough to take on his league. Are you ready?
